code:
# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @param {Integer} target
# @return {Integer}
def min_operations(nums, target)
    freq = Hash.new(0)
    nums.each { |num| freq[num] += 1 }
    operations = 0

    while target > 0
        largest = [target, nums.max].min
        while largest > 0 and freq[largest] == 0
            largest >>= 1
        end
        return -1 if largest == 0

        if target >= largest
            needed = target / largest
            take = [needed, freq[largest]].min
            target -= take * largest
            freq[largest] -= take
        end

        if largest > 1 and freq[largest] > 0
            freq[largest / 2] += freq[largest] * 2
            operations += freq[largest]
            freq[largest] = 0
        end
    end

    operations
end
